entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:59 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.0°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 5.0°C

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
